name: Linear Phase Coil
desc: Linear phase coils are much more efficient than standard coils and have a %s reduction in phase activation cost, upkeep, and cooldown time depending on hull size. They are also able to keep a low level phase field around the ship during burn, reducing the ship's effective sensor profile to 0.

name: Ghost Monolith Phase Coil Retrofit
desc: Using some techniques applicable to ships with linear phase coils, reduces phase activation cost, upkeep, and cooldown time by %s depending on hull size.
